title: Threat Level Midnight
description: Secret agent Michael Scarn comes out of retirement to help the President stop Goldenface from bombing the NHL All-Star Game.
quote: On your marks. Get set. Die!
altHero: Michael Scott is Michael Scarn, shooting two guns
alt1: Scarn talks with his robot butler Samuel L. Chang (Schrute) in the Oval Office
alt3: Scarn prepares for an ice race next to a man in a hockey mask
alt4: Goldenface follows Scarn in an ice skating gun chase
